attributes.action: Legalize marijuana for medical use and recreational use for 18+
attributes.additional_details: Legalizing cannabis for recreational use will create a large economy flow for the country, through the txation, need for vendor licensing, and supply sources. It could also have the potential to save so many lives if it is availible for medical treatment and research, as there are cases of it treating certain types of cancer. It will also cause a drop in crime rate as it eill kill the market for dealers as there will be a safer and legal way to obtain it, so will therefore force dealers to stop.
attributes.background: Make it legal for cannabis to be used recreationaly for people 18+, as well as for it to be used more extensively in medical treatment and research

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Legalise medical and recreational cannabis in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551846

Allow the British public to vote on the legalisation of cannabis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318654
